sobjectId.description: The id of the sobject to place.

parts.description: The parts of an assembly (tree) are again assemblies.

v1Assembly.description: An assembly (tree) defines a subset of a layout that can be assembled unambiguously.

v1Connectable.description: A connectable (sobject) connects in an connection process.

connecting.description: The connecting sobject. It is interchangable with the connected.

connected.description: The connected sobject. It is interchangable with the connecting.

v1Connection.description: An connection can be used to connect two connectables.

sobjectId.description: The sobject id that was used to construct the element.

prototypePlanHash.description: The hash of the plan for the prototype of the element.

v1Element.description: An element is the atom of a design. It has several representations and a pose.

v1LayoutStrategy.description:
A layout strategy affects in which orders connections are triggered.

 - LAYOUTSTRATEGY_BREADTHFIRST: A breadth first layout strategy will connect all neighbours first before these start to do the same with their neighbours.
 - LAYOUTSTRATEGY_DEPTHFIRST: A depth first layout strategy will always prioritize to choose the neighbour of the neighbour first before the other neighbours of the root.

representationProtocol.description: An optional representation protocol for the link.

ports.description: Optional port names to connect to. The hierarchy should matter.

biasParameters.description: Optional parameters to bias the connection.

v1Link.description: A link defines the parameters for a connectable.

context.description: Optional context field to describe the context of the parameter.

url.description: The url of the prototype definition.

pointOfView.title: Point of view (origin) from the pose (reference frame/coordinate system)

view.title: View (orientation) from the pose (reference frame/coordinate system)

v1Pose.description: A pose is a static reference frame/coordinate system.

v1Quaternion.description: (Unit) quaternions represent (here) (rotational) orientation. It can be interpreted as the view of an object.

v1RepresentationProtocol.description:
The representation protocol determines what type of representation the connecting will see of the connected in the connection process.

 - REPRESENTATIONPROTOCOL_NONE: The connecting sees no representation of the connected.
 - REPRESENTATIONPROTOCOL_SIMPLE: In the simple representation protocol everything is represented by a point.
 - REPRESENTATIONPROTOCOL_FULL: In the full representation protocol everything is represented by its native form where all information is available. This will most likely lead to strong coupled elements. Only use when absolutely necessary.

concept.title: Concept for the scope e.g Fassade, Floor

order.description: Optionally define the order. Othwerwise it will be implicitly ordered by declaration.

v1Scope.description: Describes the scope of a parameter.

id.description: Id that allows to distinguish it from other sobjects.

pose.description: The (rough) pose of the element. In the layout process this will most likely be adjusted if not specified otherwise in the assembly.

concepts.description: Concept that are relevent for the sobject.
